so let's get started by diving into the

i've said before we made a commitment
early on as a campaign that we were not

the only way really to do this at any
measure of scale is to have a group of
people comb through the donations

filtering criteria
this process is difficult time consuming
and is prone to error
when done by hand this usually involves
setting a threshold for the amount of
money an individual
has given and research whether or not

now instead what we were able to do was

for example we committed to not
